DOC.brief_summary: The project involve evaluation web-based nutrition education program pilot-testing new smartphone app real-time data log identify factor cause glycemic variability .
DOC.brief_title: Use Mobile-based Technologies Improve Diabetes Self-management Postprandial Glucose Control
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention three ( 3 ) month duration entail use smart phone app real-time data log identify factor cause glycemic variability , well use web-based nutrition education program . The investigator postulate interactive nutrition education curriculum — provide feedback patient inter-relationship food intake postprandial glucose profile , well practical guidance improvement — lead change food choice improve post-prandial glucose control .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Individuals satisfy follow condition consider participation : 1 . Must age 25 75 year age ( inclusive ) 2 . Type 1 diabetes diagnosis least 1 year , treat multiple daily injection insulin pump . 3 . A1c 7.59.0 % Exclusion Criteria 1 . Current past use realtime CGM 2 month . 2 . Pregnancy ( selfreported ) plan conception next 6 month . 3 . History disorder eating , actively try lose weight planning , BMI > 30 kg/m2 ( limit participation individual actively try lose weight ) , 4 . Medical condition medication would affect gastric empty gastroparesis , bariatric surgery , medication pramlinitide , liraglutide exenatide .
